author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Weizhan Guo "multi-tenant function do not work correctly if switch from one app to another by click the menu" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-3956) - OFBIZ-3956

I found a problem when I switched from one app to another. The multi-tenant did not work if the username and password were the same in the main database and tenants (or different tenants). For example, the password of admin is ofbiz in main database and in DEMO1 tenant, first log in to catalog as admin of tenant DEMO1, and then switch to the content app, the data of content app is from the main database instead of DEMO1.
I debugged this problem, and the code was missing to check the userlogin tenant in checkExternalLoginKey.

author: jleroux

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Sascha Rodekamp "Accounting Map Proc - CreditCard Validation" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-3956) - OFBIZ-3956
A small improvement in the Accounting payment map procs.
The Credit card number was only checked if it is empty. After the patch the map proc checks if it is a valid credit card number.
